data.name: What Lies in the Multiverse - Main Theme
data.detailed_description: Receive the main theme of the game for free, available to use on your mobile phone or anywhere you would like! If you enjoy the gift, please consider following our publisher page
data.about_the_game: Receive the main theme of the game for free, available to use on your mobile phone or anywhere you would like! If you enjoy the gift, please consider following our publisher page
data.short_description: Receive the main theme of the game for free, available to use on your mobile phone or anywhere you would like! If you enjoy the gift, please consider following our publisher page
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, 2 GB Memory
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
